channel.title: Ferocious 718 | The most Advanced 718 of them all
channel.description:
[center][img]http://img15.imageshack.us/img15/6391/553e124246db4758b991c75.png[/img]
You are about to take journey out of this world, forget the world around you forget the people around you, you are entering... Ferocious
Forums: [url=http://ferocious718.com]http://ferocious718.com[/url] | Play Now: [url=http://ferocious718.com/]http://ferocious718.com/[/url]
[SIZE=4]Features[/SIZE] Customizing Completionist/max cape 1-120 dungeoneering with rewards Queen Black Dragon Fight Kiln
QUESTS
Duel Arena | Soulwars |castlewars |pest control minigames |
23 fully working skills
Recipe for disaster quest
Ancient Effigies
Armadyl spells
Chatoics with Dungeoneering
Fully working minigames
full godwars dungeon
polypore dungeon
jadinko lair
tormented demons
farming
bork
chaos elemental
Latest Runescape items and emotes
30 cute working pets from baby to grown pet!
Auras
loyalty stores
Glacors
Skeletal Wyvern
Culiomancer gloves!
and many more
MEDIA[/center]
[img]http://img820.imageshack.us/img820/8566/0b54e1dd27bc448fa7710e2.png[/img] [img]http://img43.imageshack.us/img43/6243/8bfd6d31a96447f9a239b6d.png[/img] [img]http://img585.imageshack.us/img585/4179/4ec6595e25ec44568b36a7b.png[/img] [img]http://img253.imageshack.us/img253/2849/5c5c33395aef42d9b12d2fe.png[/img] [img]http://img15.imageshack.us/img15/9100/af35caf0cf9843739eacbb1.png[/img] [img]http://img23.imageshack.us/img23/6899/eaea448595b14e769a3bac9.png[/img] [CENTER][SIZE=5]FRIENDLY STAFF[/SIZE][/CENTER] [img]http://img20.imageshack.us/img20/4771/69b5413de65b48799e4a84b.png[/img] [img]http://img62.imageshack.us/img62/7556/738a654af2034b9a86bcf54.png[/img] [img]http://img10.imageshack.us/img10/1174/f515e66bd3084b9e82b127d.png[/img] [img]http://img16.imageshack.us/img16/5400/977acb1570b941be945cb5a.png[/img] [img]http://img255.imageshack.us/img255/6866/05ad37ceccd447ec815bacf.png[/img] [img]http://img543.imageshack.us/img543/6746/1f52570128614f2da1eff95.png[/img] [img]http://img585.imageshack.us/img585/8321/6b2e4e35f19c4c6cad50afc.png[/img] [img]http://img812.imageshack.us/img812/8471/71dcae0ddd1f45498ac24ce.png[/img] [img]http://img819.imageshack.us/img819/6373/fb193627f752460ba785153.png[/img]
[center][b]VIDEOS [/b][/center]
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=CbDq9CMl0Rc[/youtube] [/center]
